bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard
Systems and software engineering -- Guidelines for the utilization of ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 in the context of system of systems (S0S)
ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard - Systems and software engineering -- Guidelines for the utilization of ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 in the context of system of systems (S0S)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides guidance on the application of processes in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 to systems of systems (SoS). The scope of this document is the same as ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, which addresses more than systems engineering activities.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
